preqs: Students must have passed AFG1300, BFG1300, BFW1300 or AFW1300 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {AFC3170, AFF2401, BFC3170, BFF2401}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {AFG1300, AFW1300, BFB1300, BFC2000, BFF1300, BFG1300, BFW1001, BFW1300} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Unit was previously coded {AFF2401%, AFW2401%, BFW2401, DEB240, DEB2401, FIN240, FIN2401}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 20, 41, 50}

description: This unit examines the major risks and issues faced by financial institutions within the context of the global environment. Topics include an introduction to the banking environment, bank performance, management of bank risks including credit, capital, liquidity and interest rate risk, loan pricing, liability management, investment management and capital adequacy.
